Good Nuwa Wamala Nnyanzi (amụrụ na iri abụọ na asatọ nọwa Ọktoba 1952), nke a maara dị ka Nuwa Nnyanzi, bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na Uganda
Ọ bụ onye guzobere, onye nwe, na onye isi nchịkwa nke Nnyanzi Art Studio na Kampala, isi obodo Uganda.
A mụrụ ya na Central Region nke Uganda
Nna ya bụ onye na-enyere aka n'ụlọ nyocha na nne ya bụ onye nọọsụ na-amụ nwa
O nwere diplọma na nka na imewe ụlọ ọrụ site na CTS YMCA na Nairobi, Kenya
O nwetara nzere Master of Arts ya na Mahadum Middlesex na United Kingdom.
Site na 1978 ruo 1992, Nnyanzi biri na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Nairobi
Mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ, ọ malitere ise ihe na ịkpụ ihe n'onwe ya

Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ya ma na-enweta ihe ọ na-eri site na nkà mmụta onwe ya, ruo mgbe o nwetara ego zuru ezu iji kwụọ ụgwọ maka nkuzi nka. N'afọ 1992, ọ laghachiri Uganda wee mepee Nnyanzi Art Studio. Kemgbe ahụ, "na-etinye ndụ ya n'ịmepụta, ịnakọta, idepụta na ịkwalite ọdịbendị na ihe nketa okike bara ọgaranya nke Uganda na nke mpaghara Great Lakes". O meela ọtụtụ ọmụmụ ihe, ngagharị iwe, nkuzi, na ngosipụta banyere isiokwu a na mba dị iche iche gụnyere Kenya, South Africa, United Kingdom, Australia, na United States.

Nuwa Nnyanzi na-eje ozi n'ọkwa ndị a, na mgbakwunye na ọrụ oge niile ya: (1) Minista nke Ọdịbendị na nka na kọmitii nke Alaeze Buganda (2) Onye isi oche nke Uganda Artists' Association (3) Onye isi oche of the Kampala Central Branch of the Uganda Red Cross (4) Onye isi oche de la Rotary Club of Kampala West na (5) Onye isi nke Uganda National Arts and Crafts Village.
